job_description:
Role: Senior Java Developer with Microservices

Location: Remote/Canada

Duration: 6 Months

Job Description

Senior Java Developer with Backend with Strong Microservicece experience -Remote

Deeply passionate about learning and innovating using the latest technologies

Strong design skills for individual applications (solution architecture) and across

applications (enterprise architecture)

7+ years of experience in object-oriented programming with expertise in languages such

Java,

Must Have: Java, J2EE, Object-oriented design, Algorithms, Spring Boot, Microservices

Experience with Agile methodologies

Ability to produce quality results in an evolving and a fast-paced environment

Familiar with development tools such as Jenkins, Rundeck, SVN/Crucible/Jira, Git/Stash

etc.

Experience with containers, Kubernetes/ Docker

Experience with cloud - GCP,GKE or AWS
